thm_explanation_1: Jonathan Zazula was a music industry executive and founder of Megaforce Records.
thm_explanation_2: He owned Rock'n Roll Heaven record store.

thm_explanation_1: Jonathan Zazula was a music industry executive and founder of Megaforce Records.
thm_explanation_2: Zazula's record store and tape-trading network played a central role in the East Coast metal scene.
